Class Beacon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.estimote.sdk.connection.settings.Beacon

  • public class Beacon
extends java.lang.Object
    Estimote Beacon settings.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DeviceSetting<java.lang.Integer> advertisingInterval()
      Broadcasting interval (100-10000ms).
      DeviceSetting<java.lang.Boolean> enable()
      Enables or disables Estimote beacon advertiser.
      DeviceSetting<java.lang.Boolean> enableMotionUUID()
      Enables motion UUID advertising - advertise different UUID when device is in motion.
      DeviceSetting<java.lang.Integer> major()
      Major number (from 1 to 65535).
      DeviceSetting<java.lang.Integer> minor()
      Minor number (from 1 to 65535).
      DeviceSetting<java.lang.Boolean> nonStrictMode()
      Turns on/off protocol restrictions.
      DeviceSetting<java.util.UUID> proximityUUID()
      Advertised proximity UUID.
      DeviceSetting<java.lang.Boolean> secure()
      Turns on/off Secure UUID.
      DeviceSetting<java.lang.Integer> securePeriodScaler()
      Sets UUID period scaler.
      DeviceSetting<java.lang.Integer> transmitPower()
      Transmit transmitPower (Allowed values: -30, -20, -16, -12, -8, -4, 0, 4 dBm).
